title: ISlotMateFeatureData.Distance
description: Gets or sets the distance from the end of the slot where to place the component axis in this slot mate.
returns: Distance from the end of the slot
remarks:
This property is valid only if
ISlotMateFeatureData::Constraint
is set to
swSlotMateConstraintOptions_e
.swSlotMateConstraintOption_Distance.
To change the endpoint from which the distance is measured, set
ISlotMateFeatureData::FlipDirection
to true.
